Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.05007029 0.56103627 0.43502339 0.43759694 0.03443236 0.13245857
#>  [7] 0.50862961 0.51943197 0.84172772 0.73082543 0.01614544 0.01287482
#> [13] 0.03073037 0.90696746 0.51791142 0.11736675 0.64949866 0.14810305
#> [19] 0.46216655 0.22279663
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.9158895 0.4127811 0.9559638 0.7012919 0.9022835 0.9488778 0.1331502
#>  [8] 0.4888429 0.5938813 0.9172216 0.7029020 0.6764207 0.9151670 0.9414101
#> [15] 0.6442667 0.9065842 0.5769445 0.4923751 0.1858999 0.3730947

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.5420833 0.5973770 0.1173005 0.8562120 0.6496842 0.4107189 0.7988658
#>  [8] 0.5209360 0.3506062 0.1819665
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.287543195 0.297844730 0.056195792 0.240574215 0.649285517 0.247156109
#>  [7] 0.007753403 0.753214568 0.548733378 0.354425477
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.200919933 0.984092335 0.002152621 0.160324837 0.600277428 0.994604345
#>  [7] 0.349951363 0.563155750 0.255424088 0.285368922

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.89862295 0.18469977 0.05935141 0.34287455 0.93530335
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.4320025 0.9444567 0.4317434 0.4852415 0.1067190
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.5121255 0.2342622 0.6120554 0.7944925 0.2941044
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.64070359 0.53988894 0.02209721 0.72647638 0.64631598

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.4849379 0.2832446 0.9099785 0.4183325 0.3863762
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.9903620 0.1229242 0.5563807 0.7184805 0.6892909
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.45149670 0.07561266 0.97942632 0.21392413 0.50937702
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.2998759 0.1816124 0.8406335 0.4283447 0.1142632

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.8971358 0.6315214 0.1389487 0.5369713 0.8419938
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.38234225 0.99511780 0.15148724 0.05717933 0.40335619
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.57193611 0.05323433 0.14815279 0.39910954 0.17663604
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.9097151 0.8060918 0.4826903 0.1235780 0.1682894

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          4.3         3.0          1.1         0.1     setosa
#> 2          4.9         3.1          1.5         0.1     setosa
#> 3          5.5         2.4          3.8         1.1 versicolor
#> 4          5.2         3.4          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 5          4.9         3.6          1.4         0.1     setosa
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.7         2.9          4.2         1.3 versicolor
#> 2          4.6         3.4          1.4         0.3     setosa
#> 3          5.6         3.0          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 4          6.8         2.8          4.8         1.4 versicolor
#> 5          5.6         3.0          4.1         1.3 versicolor
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.0         2.3          3.3         1.0 versicolor
#> 2          5.6         3.0          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 3          5.5         2.5          4.0         1.3 versicolor
#> 4          6.3         2.8          5.1         1.5  virginica
#> 5          6.8         3.2          5.9         2.3  virginica

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           4.6         3.6
#> 2           5.1         3.3
#> 3           6.8         2.8
#> 4           5.6         3.0
#> 5           5.0         3.4
#> 6           7.6         3.0
#> 7           6.4         2.9
#> 8           5.0         2.3
#> 9           5.5         2.4
#> 10          6.7         3.1
#> 11          5.8         2.7
#> 12          5.8         2.6
#> 13          5.7         2.5
#> 14          6.4         2.8
#> 15          6.0         2.9
#> 16          5.4         3.9
#> 17          6.3         3.3
#> 18          7.7         2.8
#> 19          7.7         3.8
#> 20          7.4         2.8

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          4.5         2.3
#> 2          5.0         2.0
#> 3          6.3         2.9
#> 4          5.2         3.4
#> 5          5.0         3.2
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.7         2.6
#> 2          5.9         3.0
#> 3          6.5         3.2
#> 4          5.4         3.4
#> 5          4.8         3.4
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.4         3.1
#> 2          6.4         3.2
#> 3          6.2         2.8
#> 4          5.5         3.5
#> 5          5.2         2.7
